column1: Kata Robata////Miso Lobster Mac and Cheese ($23): This dish was probably the best bang for your buck. This plate
column3: is enough to fill up one person. The parmesan cheese
column6: were perfect; it was velvety and creamy
column7: but not too heavy. They didn't skimp out on the lobster pieces because I felt like there was almost always a piece of lobster in every bite.
